Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” depicts his adolescence up until his giving up the world (1889 – 1905); the second part, “Exit From Darkness”, starts where the first one ends and follows him on through to his death (1932).
